message: Let's start with a fair deal. I get the lion's share, but you still get a nice chunk to start with.  Let's see how this plays out!
Alice, your offer was a bit too lopsided for my liking.  Let's be more realistic.  This offer recognizes the time pressure we both face.
Okay, I see you're playing hardball. This offer is more balanced, considering the shrinking value of the money.  Let's end this quickly before things get even worse for both of us.
